According to the Chilean census in 2002, San Pedro de la Paz has an area of and 80,447 inhabitants. == History == San Pedro de la Paz was founded on 1604 by the Spaniard governor Alonso de Ribera but the commune was established on 1995. == Gallery == File:Av pac.JPG|Pedro Aguirre Cerda, the main avenue of this city File:Comuna de San Pedro de la Paz.svg|Location of San Pedro de la Paz.
